verses.verse: And <S%G2112>straightway<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G4160>held<s%> a <S%G4824>consultation<s%> with the <S%G4245>elders<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4892>council,<s%> and <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and <S%G667>carried<s%> him <S%G667>away,<s%> and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him to <S%G4091>Pilate.<s%>
And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him, <S%G1488>Are<s%> you the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%> And he <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You say <S%G3004><s%> it.
And the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2723>accused<s%> him of <S%G4183>many<s%> things: but he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3756>nothing.<s%> <S%G3762><s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> him <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G611>Answer<s%> you <S%G3756>nothing?<s%> <S%G2396>behold<s%> <S%G4214>how<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> things they <S%G2649>witness<s%> against you.
But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3765>yet<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G3756>nothing;<s%> <S%G3762><s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>marveled.<s%>
<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2596>at<s%> that <S%G1859>feast<s%> he <S%G630>released<s%> to them <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1198>prisoner,<s%> <S%G3746>whomsoever<s%> they <S%G154>desired.<s%>

And there was one <S%G3004>named<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas,<s%> which lay <S%G1210>bound<s%> with them that had <S%G4955>made<s%> <S%G4955>insurrection<s%> with him, <S%G3748>who<s%> had <S%G4160>committed<s%> <S%G5408>murder<s%> in the <S%G4714>insurrection.<s%>
And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G310>crying<s%> <S%G310>aloud<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G154>desire<s%> him to do as he had <S%G104>ever<s%> <S%G4160>done<s%> to them.
But <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2309>Will<s%> you that I <S%G630>release<s%> to you the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%>
For he <S%G1097>knew<s%> that the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> had <S%G3860>delivered<s%> him for <S%G5355>envy.<s%>
But the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G383>moved<s%> the <S%G3793>people,<s%> that he should <S%G3123>rather<s%> <S%G630>release<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> to them.

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> to them, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> you <S%G3767>then<s%> that I shall <S%G4160>do<s%> to him <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G3004>call<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews?<s%>
And they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> him.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G1063>Why,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> has he <S%G4160>done?<s%> And they <S%G2896>cried<s%> out the <S%G4056>more<s%> <S%G4056>exceedingly,<s%> <S%G4717>Crucify<s%> him.

And so <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> <S%G1014>willing<s%> to <S%G2425>content<s%> the <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G630>released<s%> <S%G912>Barabbas<s%> to them, and <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when he had <S%G5417>scourged<s%> him, to be <S%G4717>crucified.<s%>

And the <S%G4757>soldiers<s%> <S%G520>led<s%> him <S%G520>away<s%> <S%G2080>into<s%> the <S%G833>hall,<s%> <S%G3739>called<s%> <S%G2076><s%> <S%G4232>Praetorium;<s%> and they <S%G4779>call<s%> <S%G4779>together<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G4686>band.<s%>
And they <S%G1746>clothed<s%> him with <S%G4209>purple,<s%> and <S%G4120>platted<s%> a <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G174>thorns,<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> it <S%G4060>about<s%> his head,
And <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G782>salute<s%> him, <S%G5463>Hail,<s%> <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews!<s%>
And they <S%G5180>smote<s%> him on the <S%G2776>head<s%> with a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and did <S%G1716>spit<s%> on him, and <S%G5087>bowing<s%> their <S%G1119>knees<s%> <S%G4352>worshipped<s%> him.

And <S%G3753>when<s%> they had <S%G1702>mocked<s%> him, they <S%G1562>took<s%> <S%G609>off<s%> the <S%G4209>purple<s%> from him, and <S%G1746>put<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G2440>clothes<s%> <S%G1746>on<s%> him, and <S%G1806>led<s%> him out to <S%G4717>crucify<s%> him.

And they <S%G29>compel<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> a <S%G2956>Cyrenian,<s%> who <S%G3855>passed<s%> by, <S%G2064>coming<s%> out of the <S%G68>country,<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> of <S%G223>Alexander<s%> and <S%G4504>Rufus,<s%> to <S%G142>bear<s%> his <S%G4716>cross.<s%>
And they <S%G5342>bring<s%> him to the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G1115>Golgotha,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is, being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> The <S%G5117>place<s%> of a <S%G2898>skull.<s%>
And they <S%G1325>gave<s%> him to <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> mingled with <S%G4669>myrrh:<s%> but he <S%G2983>received<s%> it not.

And when they had <S%G4717>crucified<s%> him, they <S%G1266>parted<s%> his <S%G2440>garments,<s%> <S%G906>casting<s%> <S%G2819>lots<s%> on them, <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5100>every<s%> man should <S%G142>take.<s%>
And it was the <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G5610>hour,<s%> and they <S%G4717>crucified<s%> him.
And the <S%G1923>superscription<s%> of his <S%G156>accusation<s%> was <S%G1924>written<s%> <S%G1924>over,<s%> THE <S%G935>KING<s%> OF THE <S%G2453>JEWS.<s%>

And with him they <S%G4717>crucify<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G3027>thieves;<s%> the <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> his <S%G1188>right<s%> hand, and the <S%G1520>other<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> his <S%G2176>left.<s%>
And the <S%G1124>scripture<s%> was <S%G4137>fulfilled,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> And he was <S%G3049>numbered<s%> with the <S%G459>transgressors.<s%>

And they that <S%G3899>passed<s%> by <S%G987>railed<s%> on him, <S%G2795>wagging<s%> their <S%G2776>heads,<s%> and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3758>Ah,<s%> you that <S%G2647>destroy<s%> the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> and <S%G3618>build<s%> it in <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days,<s%>
<S%G4982>Save<s%> <S%G4572>yourself,<s%> and <S%G2597>come<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from the <S%G4716>cross.<s%>

<S%G3668>Likewise<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> the <S%G749>chief<s%> <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G1702>mocking<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves<s%> with the <S%G1122>scribes,<s%> He <S%G4982>saved<s%> <S%G243>others;<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> he <S%G3756>cannot<s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G4982>save.<s%>

Let <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel<s%> <S%G2597>descend<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> from the <S%G4716>cross,<s%> that we may <S%G1492>see<s%> and <S%G4100>believe.<s%> And they that were <S%G4957>crucified<s%> with him <S%G3679>reviled<s%> him.

And when the <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> there was <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> the <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G1095>land<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour.<s%>

And at the <S%G1766>ninth<s%> <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G994>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1682>Eloi,<s%> <S%G1682>Eloi,<s%> <S%G2982>lama<s%> sabachthani? <S%G4518><s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is, being <S%G3177>interpreted,<s%> My <S%G2316>God,<s%> my <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G1519>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> have you <S%G1459>forsaken<s%> me?
And <S%G5100>some<s%> of them that <S%G3936>stood<s%> by, when they <S%G191>heard<s%> it, <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> he <S%G5455>calls<s%> <S%G2243>Elias.<s%>

And <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G5143>ran<s%> and <S%G1072>filled<s%> a <S%G4699>sponge<s%> full of <S%G3690>vinegar,<s%> and <S%G4060>put<s%> it <S%G4060>on<s%> a <S%G2563>reed,<s%> and <S%G4222>gave<s%> him to <S%G4222>drink,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G863>Let<s%> <S%G863>alone;<s%> let us <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G1487>whether<s%> <S%G2243>Elias<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G2507>take<s%> him <S%G2507>down.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G863>cried<s%> with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%> and gave up the <S%G1606>ghost.<s%>
And the <S%G2665>veil<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> was <S%G4977>rent<s%> in <S%G1417>two<s%> from the <S%G509>top<s%> to the <S%G2736>bottom.<s%>

And when the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3936>stood<s%> <S%G1537>over<s%> <S%G1727><s%> <S%G1537>against<s%> <S%G1727><s%> him, <S%G1492>saw<s%> that he <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%> out, and gave up the <S%G1606>ghost,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G230>Truly<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> was the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

There were <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> <S%G2334>looking<s%> on <S%G3113>afar<s%> <S%G575>off:<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> was <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the <S%G3384>mother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G3398>less<s%> and of <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> and <S%G4539>Salome;<s%>

<S%G3739>(Who<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> he was in <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him, and <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to him;) and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G243>other<s%> women <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4872>came<s%> up with him to <S%G2414>Jerusalem.<s%>
And <S%G2235>now<s%> when the <S%G3798>even<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> <S%G1893>because<s%> it was the <S%G3904>preparation,<s%> that is, the day <S%G4315>before<s%> the <S%G4315>sabbath,<s%>

<S%G2501>Joseph<s%> of <S%G707>Arimathaea,<s%> an <S%G2158>honorable<s%> <S%G1010>counselor,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4327>waited<s%> for the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> and <S%G1525>went<s%> in <S%G5111>boldly<s%> to <S%G4091>Pilate,<s%> and <S%G154>craved<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

And <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> he were <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G2348>dead:<s%> and <S%G4341>calling<s%> to him the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> he <S%G1905>asked<s%> him <S%G1487>whether<s%> he had been any <S%G3819>while<s%> <S%G599>dead.<s%>
And when he <S%G1097>knew<s%> it of the <S%G2760>centurion,<s%> he <S%G1433>gave<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> to <S%G2501>Joseph.<s%>

And he <S%G59>bought<s%> fine <S%G4616>linen,<s%> and <S%G2507>took<s%> him <S%G2507>down,<s%> and <S%G1750>wrapped<s%> him in the <S%G4616>linen,<s%> and <S%G2698>laid<s%> him in a <S%G3419>sepulcher<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> was <S%G2998>hewn<s%> out of a <S%G4073>rock,<s%> and <S%G4351>rolled<s%> a <S%G3037>stone<s%> to the <S%G2374>door<s%> of the <S%G3419>sepulcher.<s%>
And <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene<s%> and <S%G3137>Mary<s%> the mother of <S%G2500>Joses<s%> <S%G2334>beheld<s%> <S%G4226>where<s%> he was <S%G5087>laid.<s%>
